title: Water Supply Maintenance - Saturday, January 20th
content: Dear Residents, We will be conducting essential water tank cleaning and pipeline maintenance on Saturday, January 20th from 10:00 AM to 4:00 PM. Water supply will be temporarily interrupted during this period. Please store adequate water in advance. We apologize for any inconvenience caused.

title: Monthly Society Meeting - January 25th
content: Monthly General Body Meeting scheduled for January 25th at 7:00 PM in the Community Hall. Agenda includes budget review, upcoming projects discussion, and resident feedback session. All residents are encouraged to attend.

title: New Visitor Entry Policy - Effective Immediately
content: To enhance security, all visitors must now register at the main gate with valid ID proof. Residents will receive SMS notifications for visitor arrivals. Pre-approval through the society app is encouraged for frequent visitors. Security guards have been briefed on the new protocol.

title: Holi Festival Celebration - March 8th
content: Join us for the annual Holi celebration on March 8th at 4:00 PM in the society garden. Organic colors will be provided. Refreshments and traditional sweets will be served. All age groups welcome. Let's celebrate the festival of colors together!

title: Elevator Maintenance - Building A & C
content: Annual maintenance of elevators in Building A and Building C will be conducted on January 22nd and 23rd respectively. Each elevator will be out of service for approximately 6 hours. Alternative arrangements and timings will be posted at each building.

title: Parking Rules Reminder
content: Reminder to all residents: Please park only in designated slots. Unauthorized parking in visitor areas, fire lanes, or blocking other vehicles will result in towing at owner's expense. Guest parking is limited to 4 hours maximum.

title: Gym Equipment Upgrade Complete
content: We're excited to announce that our community gym has been upgraded with new equipment including treadmills, cross-trainers, and strength training machines. New operating hours: 5:00 AM to 11:00 PM. Membership registration is open at the management office.

title: Internet Connectivity Upgrade
content: Our society is upgrading to fiber optic internet connectivity. Installation will begin in Building B on January 18th and progressively cover all buildings. Residents can expect faster and more reliable internet service. Contact management for connection details.

title: Pest Control Treatment - This Weekend
content: Professional pest control treatment will be conducted in common areas this weekend (January 20-21). Treatment includes gardens, basement, stairwells, and garbage collection areas. Residents are advised to keep windows closed and avoid common areas during treatment hours (6 AM - 10 AM).

title: Society Annual Day - February 14th
content: Save the date! Our Society Annual Day celebration will be held on February 14th starting 6:00 PM. Cultural performances, awards ceremony, and dinner included. Registration for cultural activities is now open. Contact the Cultural Committee for participation details.
